system.description:
You become adept at ensuring those you are hunting do not escape. Once per turn at your option, you can spend 1 exertion to gain one of the following benefits until the end of the turn:

  • Triple the range of any thrown weapon you use

  • Increase  the DC of non-lethal poisons you create by 2 points (to a maximum of your maneuver DC)

  • Gain  advantage on Perception and Investigation checks to find secret doors or compartments, concealed weapons, and creatures attempting to hide from you with Stealth.
